name: Fruit Hater (SanyingLi)
description:
How to play:

Click the screen, the fruit hater will jump through the direction you just clicked.

Hold the mouse can add the jump force. 

Don't let your hater eat the fruits! It will become more big and more ugly.(and more easy to touch the traps)

Try to avid the traps and get to the end. Good Luck!
